page.title: 15The Royal Visit 1985.
page.content: The new Hospital was opened on 17th May by Her Majesty the Queen.She came from London on the 11.16am train to Colchester's North Station.She drove from the station in her black limousine Bentley, which had a shield on the top with the royal coat of arms engraved on it.It had a window which curved down from the roof which was like a sunroof.She drove along Cowdray Avenue and up past Smiths Do-It-All store, where our class was standing and cheering.She was wearing a green dress and a hat with a veil.She was driven straight to the University of Essex where she met members of staff and some students.When she opened the new Hospital in Turner Road she looked around the wards and met the nurses. The Royal visit was the first in nearly 27 years.
